Uses of Package
org.jppf.node.event

  • Packages that use org.jppf.node.event 
    Package Description
    org.jppf.node.event
    Support classes for node event notifications.
    org.jppf.node.screensaver
    Support for a screen saver associated with a node.
    org.jppf.node.screensaver.impl
    Support for a screen saver associated with a node.
  • Classes in org.jppf.node.event used by org.jppf.node.event 
    Class and Description
    NodeLifeCycleErrorHandler
    Interface for handling uncaught throwables raised when executing one of the methods of NodeLifeCycleListener.
    NodeLifeCycleEvent
    Instances of this class represent node life cycle events.
    NodeLifeCycleEventType
    A type safe enumeration of all possible types of node life cycle events.
    NodeLifeCycleListener
    Interface for all listeners to the node's life cycle events.
    TaskExecutionEvent
    Instances of this class represent events that occur during the life span of an individual JPPF task.
  • Classes in org.jppf.node.event used by org.jppf.node.screensaver 
    Class and Description
    NodeLifeCycleListener
    Interface for all listeners to the node's life cycle events.
    NodeLifeCycleListenerAdapter
    Convenience class that can be used when not all methods of NodeLifeCycleListener need to be implemented.
    TaskExecutionEvent
    Instances of this class represent events that occur during the life span of an individual JPPF task.
    TaskExecutionListener
    Interface for all classes that wish to listen to events occurring during the life span of individual JPPF tasks.
  • Classes in org.jppf.node.event used by org.jppf.node.screensaver.impl 
    Class and Description
    NodeLifeCycleEvent
    Instances of this class represent node life cycle events.
    NodeLifeCycleListener
    Interface for all listeners to the node's life cycle events.
    NodeLifeCycleListenerAdapter
    Convenience class that can be used when not all methods of NodeLifeCycleListener need to be implemented.
    TaskExecutionListener
    Interface for all classes that wish to listen to events occurring during the life span of individual JPPF tasks.
